item.description: DE: [Nom de la victime/témoin-clé/lanceur d’alerte, masqué pour conserver l’anonymat] (Visitez le site X-v-France.com pour plus d’informations) SUBJECT: defamation against my consumer protection websites DATE: December 8, 2016 at 00:05 (Beijing time +0800) TO : Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com, Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com, Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com I forgot to mention… As for me, I am going to file a lawsuit against “X” (but targeting McDonald’s) for, among other things, defamation. item.title: Reply from Gloria Santona, General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation
item.description: KEY POINT OF THIS EVENT: By acknowledging that McDonald’s Corporation executives “take such inquiries seriously”, McDonald’s Corporation can’t claim plausible deniability anymore. Furthermore, the email from Ms. Santona who is the General Counsel of McDonald’s Corporation is CCed to the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation Steve Easterbrook. DE: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com OBJET: RE: update DATE DE RÉCEPTION：2015-10-21 23:47 (Beijing time +0800) À: [Nom de la victime/témoin-clé/lanceur d’alerte, masqué pour conserver l’anonymat] (Visitez le site X-v-France.com pour plus d’informations)
